data.title: Blue star Lee Ryan becomes dad for fourth time
data.meta_description: Blue singer Lee Ryan shocked fans by announcing he's become a dad for the fourth time, after his wife Verity Paris gave birth to a baby girl.
data.text:
He's shared a cute photo!

Congratulations are in order for Blue singer Lee Ryan, who has become a father for the fourth time after his wife Verity Paris gave birth to a beautiful baby girl in October.

Lee, who chose to keep his wife's pregnancy a secret, announced the couple's lovely news on TikTok, where he gave fans a glimpse of his new baby girl whilst explaining his absence during Blue's current promotional tour.

Holding his bundle of joy, Lee told fans: "Hey everyone. I just wanted to say sorry that I'm not there for the promo right now.

"Everything's ok. I know the boys are doing everything. I know there are a lot of people talking madness. I've actually had a little baby. She's only three weeks old now, so I'm at home with my family, being a dad and being with the children."

Although Lee didn't reveal the name of his daughter, the new arrival is his fourth child in total, and second with his wife Verity. The couple, who got married in March, welcomed their first child together in June last year, a healthy baby girl.

Lee is also a proud dad to daughter Bluebell with his ex Jessica Keevil, and son Rayn with his ex fiancÃ© Samantha Miller.

Check out which other famous faces welcomed babies in 2022:

Lee, who is due to perform at Hits Live Birmingham on Saturday 12th November alongside his Blue bandmates Duncan James, Simon Webbe and Antony Costa, has been absent on the group's promo tour for their new album 'Heart & Soul'.

After announcing their comeback album in April, the 'All Rise' hit makers dropped their sixth studio album on Friday 28th October.

The group also delighted fans earlier this year by announcing they are heading out on tour in December this year.

See Blue's tour dates for 2022 below:
